title: Number of Crunchyroll subscribers 2012 to 2018
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in thousands for 6 number of Months.
Month November 2018 has the highest Number of users in thousands and September 2012 has the lowest Number of users in thousands.
The difference of Number of users in thousands between the highest and lowest Month is 1900.0.
min_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Number of users in thousands in each Month on the y axis.
The Number of users in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Month November 2018 and lowest at Month September 2012.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in thousands for 6 number of Months.
Month November 2018 has the highest Number of users in thousands and September 2012 has the lowest Number of users in thousands.
The difference of Number of users in thousands between the highest and lowest Month is 1900.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of users in thousands in the y axis.
The Number of users in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Month November 2018 and lowest at Month September 2012.
The highest value at Month November 2018 is 20.0x times more than the lowest value at September 2012.
The Month November 2018 has the highest Number of users in thousands, followed by February 2017, and November 2015. Down to the Month September 2012 which is the lowest.
Over the past 6 Months, the Number of users in thousands has reduced.
The Month November 2018 tends to be 2.7 percent higher than average.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 4450.0.
